metadata.name: //CWS. x Triptcip Airdrop
metadata.description:
Triptcip :: A first of its kind platform to introduce real-time visual synthesis combined with electronic music into the NFT space, is releasing a collection of NFTs called Objects.
Each Object is a software license for Triptcip's audiovisual software, VOID.  More information here: https://triptcip.com/

This airdrop gives recipients the following exclusive access:

**CWS :: Patron & Collector Token Holders**

:: 24 hour pre-sale/white-list access to Objects sale

**CWS :: Artist Token Holders**

:: Unlimited full access to VOID

:: Unlimited access to Triptcipâ€™s Creator Platform (mint VOID NFTs)

**BENEFITS ARE NON-TRANSFERABLE**
